name: QUACK! (The Tip Studios)
description:
Come and compete against our contenders, we got Quackzilla,  Quackers, the Quacken and many more!

In this delightful race, we will see many rubber duckies competing for the coveted 1st place in the Grand Prix. They will swim, they will tumble, they will clash but above all, they will QUACK!!!

Main Features

Customize your own rubber ducky and see it compete against other rubber ducks to win the race of a lifetime.

Make your rubber ducky quack as pimped as it can to ensure its chances of victory.

Controls

LMB Click - Customize your rubber duck

Spacebar - Quack!

Further Information:

Developers

Rodrigo Pinheiro - Gameplay/System Programmer   

Tomás Franco - 3D Artist, Visual/UI Programmer, Level Designer 

Afonso Rosa - Level Designer, Sound Designer

Duarte Bárbara - Concept Artist   

Joana Fernandes - 3D Artist
